message.body: Hey Daniel. I'm so lazy I may not come tonight. But I need to give you your jacket!!!
It's cool. I'm not going either. Not feeling so hot. Well I certainly don't want to burden you with it. We should meet up some time next week.

Did ceren wear you out last night? ;). Partying like your 22 in a 29 year old body. Casanova. Yes let's def meet up. If you want low key me and my roommate are sitting in our pjs watching tv. You r more than welcome to join
We had fun... Moving on. That invitation actually sounds amazing. Although I am already in my pjs and I'm pretty sure the NyQuil is going to kick in soon. But thank you.
Haha. We are great at lounging. Artisanal beers and trader joe snacks. It paradise for the lazy
